level.text: The OHR shall conduct audits on covered entities, as deemed necessary, to ascertain the level of compliance with the Act.

Upon the completion of an audit, results will be issued to the entity being audited, the LA Director and the OCA. Failure to meet audit standards may result in being reported in the OHR’s annual compliance report.
The LA Director shall investigate and make a determination in accordance with §§ 1221 though 1223 on any instance of noncompliance cited in the audit.
